concept.title: Trafficking
concept.shortdesc: After you test the campaign, create ad server tags from your creatives and then traffic those tags to your ad networks.

conbody.p: Ensure that the ad server is configured to pass the clickTag to the SWF, so Target can track clicks. The clickTag is called and then the dynamic ad is rendered. Make sure that the campaign is live within Test&Target at the time of trafficking so that default content is not rendered for your ads.
